name: monorepo-dev
postCreateCommand: npm install -g pnpm@10.13.0 && export PNPM_HOME=/home/vscode/.local/share/pnpm && mkdir -p $PNPM_HOME && echo 'export PNPM_HOME=/home/vscode/.local/share/pnpm' >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && echo 'export PATH=$PNPM_HOME:$PATH' >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && export PATH=$PNPM_HOME:$PATH && pnpm add -g turbo
